text:
### Remove
```
POST /api/remove
```

Remove user from project.

Request:
```javascript
{
    "token": "CB23C3395153D2414CE7FF22F925776DBF72BF309",           /* Login token */
    "username": "Emil",                    /* Username of the person to be removed */
    "project": "time rest"  /* Name of the project where you want to remove a user */
}
```
Response success:
```javascript
{
    "success": true        /* If the action was successful */
}
```
Response failure:
```javascript
{
    "success": false,
    "reason": "Invalid token, invalid username, invalid project"
}
title: POST remove
